texts.definition: Algorithmic Agents that consistently react appropriate to events concerning it or to its internal states.
markups: <style="Definition">Algorithmic Agents that consistently react appropriate to events concerning it or to its internal states.</style>

Agents controlled by game system can affect game instances in much the same way as players can. However, they do not just because of this seem to have any self-awareness. One ability that can help give this appearance is that these agents have a <style="CurrentLink">Sense of Self</style> in that they show that they care about their own situation in a consistent fashion.

In the <style="Link"><link="http://virt10.itu.chalmers.se/index.php/Assassin's%20Creed%20series">Assassin's Creed series</link></style>, opponent fight or flee depending on the odds, showing a limited <style="CurrentLink">Sense of Self</style>. Enemies that players are fighting in the <style="Link"><link="http://virt10.itu.chalmers.se/index.php/Elder%20Scrolls%20series">Elder Scrolls series</link></style> behave in the same fashion.

<style="CurrentLink">Sense of Self</style> is a way to modulate <style="Link"><link="algorithmic-agents">Algorithmic Agents</link></style> by implementing this pattern in its algorithms. Typically all games with <style="Link"><link="algorithmic-agents">Algorithmic Agents</link></style> have some level of the pattern since these <style="Link"><link="agents">Agents</link></style> need to be able to react to its environment with actions to have any agency, but players' will disregard a perceived <style="CurrentLink">Sense of Self</style> as soon as some failure to show this has been noticed. This means that providing <style="CurrentLink">Sense of Self</style> can require reacting to threats or what could potentially be threats, as well as showing memory of earlier events. <style="Link"><link="awareness-surroundings">Awareness of Surroundings</link></style> and <style="Link"><link="memory-important-events">Memory of Important Events</link></style> can help create these abilities.

<style="CurrentLink">Sense of Self</style> makes <style="Link"><link="algorithmic-agents">Algorithmic Agents</link></style> have one particular type of <style="Link"><link="emotional-attachment">Emotional Attachment</link></style>, namely that related to themselves. This can help make them show that they have <style="Link"><link="own-agenda">Own Agenda</link></style> and in many cases help create <style="Link"><link="thematic-consistency">Thematic Consistency</link></style>.

<style="Link"><link="algorithmic-agents">Algorithmic Agents</link></style>, <style="Link"><link="awareness-surroundings">Awareness of Surroundings</link></style>, <style="Link"><link="memory-important-events">Memory of Important Events</link></style>
